I have over 1k hours on console and switched to pc. I have nothing to complain about the game whatsoever. Yes the community sometimes can be toxic and may need work, but this game is solid and will be in my top 3 forever. 5 years after playing this game I still enjoy every update. Challenging myself with new killers that come out as a survivor main is super fun to me and make me wanna continue to get better at the game. Highly recommend this game to anyone who loves horror and challenging multiplayer games. Thanks for reading and have a lovely day <3
